com.example.demo.service

Class LogService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.demo.service.LogService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LogEntryDAO

    @Service
public class LogService
extends java.lang.Object
implements LogEntryDAO
    Provides services for handling log entries, which include saving and finding in their various forms. Also has methods for parsing log files
    Author:
    Zakaria
    See Also:
    LogEntryDAO

    • Method Detail

      • save

        @Transactional
public void save(LogEntry logEntry)
        Saves a LogEntry (Even a LogEntryError) into the database.
        logEntry shouldn't be null.
        Uses entityManagerFactorto save the LogEntries, should deal with the polymorphism, and save for both LogEntry and LogEntryError
        Specified by:
        save in interface LogEntryDAO
        Parameters:
        logEntry - the Model to be saved to the database.
        See Also:
        LogEntryDAO.save(com.example.demo.model.LogEntry)

      • findAll

        public java.util.List<LogEntry> findAll()
        Queries the database and returns all the logEntries in the database.
        Uses createQuery of entityManagerFactor to query the database with :
        "select a from LogEntries a "
        Specified by:
        findAll in interface LogEntryDAO
        Returns:
        List of LogEntry from the database
        See Also:
        LogEntryDAO.findAll()

      • findAllByThread

        public java.util.List<LogEntry> findAllByThread(java.lang.String thread)
        Queries the database and returns all the logEntries with a specific Thread value.
        Uses createQuery of entityManagerFactor to query the database with :
        "select a from LogEntries a where a.process like :wantedThread"
        Specified by:
        findAllByThread in interface LogEntryDAO
        Parameters:
        thread - the string to filer logEntry by Thread clm
        Returns:
        List of all log entries of with thread name
        See Also:
        LogEntryDAO.findAllByThread(java.lang.String)

      • findAllErrors

        public java.util.List<LogEntryError> findAllErrors()
        Queries the database and returns all the Error Log entries.
        Uses createQuery of entityManagerFactor to query the database with :
        "select a from LogEntryError a"
        Specified by:
        findAllErrors in interface LogEntryDAO
        Returns:
        List of all the Error logEntries in the database
        See Also:
        LogEntryDAO.findAllErrors()

      • findById

        public LogEntry findById(int id)
        Queries the database and returns Log Entry with a specific ID.
        Uses find of entityManagerFactor to query the database.
        Specified by:
        findById in interface LogEntryDAO
        Parameters:
        id - The Id of the LogEntry to find in the database
        Returns:
        Log entry with specified ID

      • parseLog

        public void parseLog(java.lang.String LogName)
        Parses the log entries in the provided log file, convert to logEntry models and save to database.
        Uses LogParseServices to parse the log file, passing the filename.
        Specified by:
        parseLog in interface LogEntryDAO
        Parameters:
        LogName - Name of the log file to be parsed

      • saveAllEntries

        @Transactional
public void saveAllEntries(java.util.List<LogEntry> entries)
        Save the collection of LogEntries to the database.
        Iterates through the entry list, passing them to save(LogEntry), saving them to the database.
        Specified by:
        saveAllEntries in interface LogEntryDAO
        Parameters:
        entries - List of LogEntry to be saved to the database.

      • findByRange

        public java.util.List<LogEntry> findByRange(java.util.Date min,
                                            java.util.Date max)
        Query the data base with filtering out any logEntries not within the specified range.
        Create a Criteria Query, then adding restrictions less and greater for the max and min timestamp respectively.
        Specified by:
        findByRange in interface LogEntryDAO
        Parameters:
        min - minimum timestamp
        max - maximum timestamp
        Returns:
        Log of Entries that are within the specified range.

      • getThreadList

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getThreadList()
        Query the database and group by the Thread clm, returns the Thread value alone.
        Used to generate HTML selects for Threads from the front end. Uses createQuery of entityManagerFactor to query the database with :
        "select a.process from LogEntries a group by a.process"
        Specified by:
        getThreadList in interface LogEntryDAO
        Returns:
        List of all the Thread names in the database

      • getClassList

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getClassList()
        Query the database and group by the className clm, returns the className value alone.
        Used to generate HTML selects for Class from the front end. Uses createQuery of entityManagerFactor to query the database with :
        "select a.className from LogEntries a group by a.className"
        Specified by:
        getClassList in interface LogEntryDAO
        Returns:
        List of all the Class names in the database

      • getPage

        public java.util.List<LogEntry> getPage(int page,
                                        java.lang.String level,
                                        int file,
                                        java.lang.String maxTime,
                                        java.lang.String minTime,
                                        java.lang.String thread,
                                        java.lang.String className)
        Used to generate a custom query to the database, allowing filter by all the columns
        method also provides paging, by sending the required page number.
        uses getCriteriaBuilder to build the query
        Specified by:
        getPage in interface LogEntryDAO
        Parameters:
        page - Required page of logEntries
        level - Filter value for Level
        file - Filter value for log file(service)
        maxTime - Filter value for upper limit timestamp
        minTime - Filter value for lower limit timestamp
        thread - Filter value for Thread
        className - Filter value for class name
        Returns:
        Filter result of LogEntries
        See Also:
        LogEntryDAO.getPage(int, java.lang.String, int, java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String)

      • addTag

        @Transactional
public void addTag(int logId,
                                   int tagId)
        Adds a tag value to a log entry, LogEntry of logId is tagged with tag of tagId
        uses TagService.findTagById(int) to get the Tag, and findById(int) to get the log entry. The tag is then added to the logEntry then updated back to the database.
        Specified by:
        addTag in interface LogEntryDAO
        Parameters:
        logId - ID of the logEntry to be tagged
        tagId - ID of the tag

      • removeTag

        @Transactional
public void removeTag(int logId)
        Remove a tag value from a log entry, LogEntry of logId has its tag removed
        Uses findById(int) to get the log entry. sets the Tag value to null and update the database.
        Specified by:
        removeTag in interface LogEntryDAO
        Parameters:
        logId - ID of the logEntry
